name: Ridhi Ranjan
college: Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College affiliated to AKTU

education.school: Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College affiliated to AKTU

projects.name: YouTube Video Performance Analysis
projects.description: Successfully utilized the YouTube Data API to collect video metadata and statistics, demonstrating API integration skills. Created interactive dashboards and reports to visualize analysis results using tools like Matplotlib and Seaborn, effectively communicating findings to stakeholders. Performed sentiment analysis on user comments and analyzed temporal trends using time series techniques to derive actionable insights.

projects.name: Blockchain Crowdfunding Platform
projects.description: Facilitated direct user engagement with 20 or more fundraising campaigns via blockchain integration, Metamask pairing, and smart contract deployment. Engineered a secure and transparent fundraising environment, processing multiple seamless donations through Ethereum transactions.

projects.name: Twitter Clone
projects.description: Crafted a feature-rich social media platform with social sign-in, tweeting, likes/hearts, comments/replies, profile edits, and drag & drop image uploads. Utilized cutting-edge technologies to create a high-quality product, resulting in a substantial 40% increase in user engagement metrics.

experiences.description: Analyzed data trends and patterns to identify strategic opportunities, leading to the implementation of targeted interventions that improved market penetration. Collaborated cross-functionally to refine data collection methodologies, ensuring a 15% increase in data accuracy and reliability. Utilized strong analytical skills to identify key growth opportunities and recommend actionable solutions, contributing to a 5% increase in overall company revenue.

Designed user-friendly web applications with 2 co-interns using .NET Framework (ASP.NET, C#) and Bootstrap. Ensured seamless user experience across multiple devices through responsive design. Managed more than 5 databases effectively using Oracle Database, ensuring integrity and security.

Served as team leader for a team of 4 co-interns on projects, fostering teamwork and project success. Cultivated proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Bootstrap, crafting 2+ dynamic and responsive frontend interfaces for enhanced user engagement. Played a pivotal role in 2 significant and live projects, gaining invaluable hands-on experience in real-world web development scenarios.

full_output.name: Ridhi Ranjan
achievements_and_awards: Attained a SGPA of 9.3 in the second semester of studies.
Ranked 19th in College and 843rd All India in CodeKaze (Round 2) by Coding Ninjas, out of nearly 1.4 lakh participants.
